Posts.Content: bburnett wrote: Could everyone who has seen "radiation recall" please tell me how it appeared, how long it occured after rads were completed, if it was triggered by something, and how long it lasted; so that I can make a more educated decision about pursuing investigation of the possibility of what I am experiencing as being IBC?  Thanks, BB Log in to post a reply
